name: Aurelia Q&A with BeMyApp
description: Recently BeMyApp [http://media.bemyapp.com] asked its community to send in a few questions about Aurelia. In response to those questions, Aurelia's Team Lead recorded this video Q&A [http://media.bemyapp.com/rob-eisenberg-answers-questions-aurelia/].
content:
Recently [BeMyApp](http://media.bemyapp.com) asked its community to send in a few questions about Aurelia. In response to those questions, Aurelia's Team Lead [recorded this video Q&A](http://media.bemyapp.com/rob-eisenberg-answers-questions-aurelia/).

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_sFeypF_c3Y" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
